alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Muskogee; Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 23 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN HASKELL... SOUTHEASTERN MCINTOSH...NORTHEASTERN PITTSBURG AND SOUTH CENTRAL MUSKOGEE COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 PM CDT... At 930 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Eufaula, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Eufaula... Quinton... Porum... Kinta... Canadian... Stidham... Arrowhead State Park... Enterprise... Lake Eufaula State Park... Onapa... Lewisville... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southeastern and east central Oklahoma.
